title: Stadionul Municipal (Sighetu Marmației)
text: Stadionul Municipal is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Sighetu%20Marma%C8%9Biei">Sighetu Marmației</a>, <a href="Romania">Romania</a>. It is used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="CSM%20Sighetu%20Marma%C8%9Biei">CSM Sighetu Marmației</a> and Plimob Sighetu Marmației. The stadium holds 5,000 people.
